articles.title: 'Under control, yet concerning': Quebec reports 279 new cases of COVID-19 - Orangeville Banner
articles.description: MONTREAL—Quebec reported 279 new cases of <a href="https://www.thestar.com/coronavirus.html">COVID-19 on Sunday, bringing the total to 64,986 cases since the pandemic began.
